titleStmt.title: SII 8.47: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 47. (A.R. No. 459 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . sakalabhuvaṉaccakravat=tikaḷ AvaṉiĀḷappiṟantārāṉa śrīkopperuñciṅkatevaṟku yāṇṭu Aiñcāvatu nāḷ 3 100 2 10 2ṉāl coḻako ṉolai . teṉṉavaṉ brahmamārāyarum jayatuṅkap pallavaraiyarum
tillaiampalap pallavaraiyarum Uṭaiyaār tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyār koyil śrīmāheśvara kaṇkāṇi ceyvārkaḷum śrīkāriyañ ceyvārkaḷum sāmutāyañceyvārkaḷum koyilnāyakañ ceyvārkaḷum tirumāḷikaikkūṟu
ceyvārkaḷum kaṇakkarum kaṇṭu viṭu tantatāvatu . śrīmāheśvarakaṇkāṇi kāttyāyaṉagotrat=tu kaṇṭiyūr tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyār kāṇiyum Iṟaiyiliyumākap peṟṟa rājādhirājavaḷanāṭṭu niluvūrnāṭṭu Irumarapuntūyape
rumāḷmaṅkalattuṭaṉ kūṭṭiṉa nilattukku Uḷvariyum tirumukappaṭi nilamumāy Ivar tampiyār tiruvaaiyāṟuṭaiyār tiruppāvāṭaicciṟappākak kuṭutta virutarājabhayaṅkaravaḷanāṭṭu kuṟukkaināṭṭu rājanārāyaṇaccaturvvetimaṅka
lattup piṟinta Arintavaṉcāttappāṭiyil OḻukaṟaiUṭaiyāṉ ciṅkaḷarāyar kāṇiyāṉa nilattu māṟik kāṇiyākap peṟṟa nilattum Irājanārāyaṇaccaturvvetimaṅkalattu veṟu Iṟukkiṟa nilamum veṟu Oṭṭuk koṇṭuvaruki
ṟa nilamum nikki nikkiniṉṟa nilattup piṭākai kiṭāraṅkoṇṭacoḻanallūril brāhmaṇappaṟṟil taram peṟṟa nilam Āṟumāk kāṇi Araikkāṇik kiḻ Orumā varai Araikkāṇiyum kaṅkaikoṇṭacoḻapurattu veṭṭic civikai Uḷ
ḷiṭṭa palaniyāyattārkku Aṭaittu veṟu Oṭṭukkoṇṭuvarukiṟa nilattu taram peṟṟa nilam Oṉṟaraiye kāṇi Araikkāṇik kiḻ Eṭṭumāvum Irājādhirājanallūreṉṟu veṟu Iṟukkiṟa nilattut taram peṟṟa ni
lam Aiñce mukkāle mummā varaiyiṉ kiḻ mukkāle kāṇi Araikkāṇiyum Āka nilam Ēḻe mukkāle mukkāṇi muntirikaik kiḻk kālum Aruntavaṉcāttappāṭiyil taram peṟṟa nilam Iraṇṭe nālumā Arai
kkāṇik kiḻ mukkālum Āka nilam patiṟṟu veliyum Antarāyam pāṭṭam Uḷppaṭa kāṇiyum Iṟaiyiliyumākap peṟṟapaṭiye tirunāmattukkāṇiyum Iṟaiyiliyumākak kuṭuttamaikkum Innilam Antarāyam pāṭṭam Uḷppa
ṭa Iṟaiyili Iṭṭappaṭikku Uḷvariyum tirumukamum tirukkai Oṭṭip paṇṭārattup pukaviṭṭu Etiraṭai Iṭavum Ippaṭikkuk kalveṭṭavum kaṭavutākap paṇṇuvate . Itu coḻakoṉ Eḻuttu Eṉṟum van
ta Ēvaṟttiṭṭiṉpaṭi kal veṭṭiyatu .
Digital edition of SII 8.47 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
